Reviews.Title: Motorola Razr9 v9
Reviews.Author: Floyd
Reviews.Content: Very good phone ,Motorola should not have stoped making the phone. Motorola should have just improved the phone.

Reviews.Title: Great next level from Razr
Reviews.Author: S. Bashir "Sb"
Reviews.Content: I was tired of using Nokia with weak signal receptions so I tried this phone and am glad I chose this one. Its a bit bigger in size from Razr V3 phone but a lot better in performance and battery life from its previous cousins.

Reviews.Title: motorola razr2 v9 flip open
Reviews.Author: gasveli , Maldives
Reviews.Content: This item I received within 12 days after order. The item was in excellent condition and I AM VERY HAPPY

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: BNKING
Reviews.Content: Had something wrong with it. Wouldnt hold a charge. We tried a new battery and charger and it still didnt work right. Sent it back.

Reviews.Title: I'm happy
Reviews.Author: Dayle E. Klappenbach
Reviews.Content: This is the second phone I ordered, I broke the 1st one shortly after I got it.  It was delivered in a timely manner, and is exactly what was advertised.

Reviews.Title: Nice uncomplicated phone
Reviews.Author: Oh Ih
Reviews.Content: So far so good.  I bought this phone as my personal phone.  I had owned Motorola razr before and was pleased with it so much so that when I've decided that I'd be content with a simple phone that can text and take pictures as well in a pinch, I ordered this phone.  I have no problems with it so far.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
Integrated 2.0-Megapixel camera, with 8x digital zoom
Connectivity featuring Micro USB, USB 2 Full Speed, USB mass storage and version 2 Bluetooth wireless technology with Enhanced Data Rate
It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
ProductInfo.Name: Razor V9
